name: Statesman Media
tagline: THE NO. 1 MEDIA COMPANY IN CENTRAL TEXAS
description:
As the #1 media company in Central Texas, our platform and audience are powerful. Print ads, Post-it Notes, polybags, digital ads, SEO, creative services, market information and more, we develop solutions that deliver results.
We are a deeply-rooted, locally-committed media company. We have been a trusted, award-winning media presence in Central Texas for more than 140 years. Though we have deep roots in print, we have embraced digital technologies, research and creative services.
